---
title: "Run on individual-level data"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

# Requirements

Weights and LD refernce ID should have same meaning and ref/alt allele info needs to match. Y sample order and pgen sample order (as defined in .psam for plink2 files or .fam for plink1 files) should match. All coordinates are in hg19.

# Prepare input

```{r setup}
library(ctwas)
```

```{r input}
# phenotype
data(Y)

# individual level genotype data
pgenfs <- system.file("extdata/example_genotype_files", paste0("example_chr", 1:22, ".pgen"), package = "ctwas")

# weight
weight <- system.file("extdata/example_fusion_weights", "Tissue", package = "ctwas")
```


# Impute expression
```{r impute, warning=F, message=F}
outputdir <- "~/temp"
exprfs <- vector()
for (i in 1:22){
  pgenf <- pgenfs[i]
  exprfs[i] <- impute_expr(pgenf = pgenf, weight = weight,
                           method = "lasso", outputdir = outputdir,
                           outname = "test")
}
```

# Run ctwas 
```{r ctwas, warning=F, message=F}
regionsfile <- system.file("extdata", "example_regions.bed", package = "ctwas")

ctwas(pgenfs, exprfs, Y, ld_regions_custom = regionsfile, thin = 1, outputdir = outputdir, outname = "test", ncore = 1)
```

```{r}
sessionInfo()
```
